OrgName.entry: ST POLYCARP, MALIN BRIDGE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Church hall available to hire for meetings, fitness activities, etc. Children's parties up to the age of 13 years welcome. Capacity around 80 people. Tables, chairs and kitchen facilities provided. Also available are two smaller meeting rooms with capacities of around 15 and 10 people, and a general crafts room. Patio area outside.
